 2011-15082011-12-01,  ,  ,  NR, 
ActCanada Revenue Agency Act
PrecisAppointment of LUCE SAMOISETTE of Sherbrooke, Quebec, selected from a list of nominees submitted by the Province of Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Management of the Canada Revenue Agency, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
